author: Eternalll
description: Monitor and control Discord Rich Presence game invites in your server. Log invite activity, restrict invite usage to specific channels, and manage who can send/receive game invites.
install_msg: Thanks for installing GameInviteControl! Use `[p]gameinvite` to get started. You'll need Manage Server permissions to configure it.
short: Monitor and manage Discord Rich Presence game invites
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores game invite log data per guild, including user IDs and invite metadata. Use `[p]gameinvite clearlog` to remove stored data.
